entry.tran: 科威特的；科威特人（或文化）的
entry.def: Kuwaiti means belonging or relating to Kuwait, or to its people or culture.
A Kuwaiti is a Kuwaiti citizen, or a person of Kuwaiti origin.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Kuwait
1. of or relating to the kingdom of Kuwait or its people;
2. of or relating to the capital of Kuwait or its residents;
